com.livelife.motolibrary

Class MotoSound

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.livelife.motolibrary.MotoSound

  • public class MotoSound
extends java.lang.Object
    MotoSound is a class used to trigger sounds in a MOTO application.
    Author:
    Max Leggieri - DTU Playware
